Dialogue.[name]: Huh? Who are you?
[playername]? Sorry, never heard of you.
Oh you’ve been helping some of the others around here? That’s nice.
Say, are you busy right now? I could use some help.
If you don't have time, then neither do I.
Have a good day I guess.
Everyone’s been so busy running around the mines killing mobs, but nobody’s really been gathering resources!
I’m running out of wood, and with winter coming, we need all the fuel we can get!
You can start by bringing me [32 oak logs]. That would be a good start.
Hey! I thought I said [32 oak logs], surely they’re not that hard to find.
I hear some of the miners say that oak logs are all over the place in the mines.
Go to the mines and get some more, then come back.
Ah this is a good start.
Okay, next on my list, I need [48 acacia logs].
Do you even know where acacia is?
The same miners that told me about the oak logs say that acacia is all over the place too.
They said it’s annoying, since it blends in with the stone and messes up their drills and such.
Don't forget that I need [48 acacia].
Good, this is great, even if the wood looks like a bunch of carrots.
Now I can see why others might’ve been letting you help them out!
Okay, next up is spruce, go grab [64 spruce logs] for me.
Hmm...not sure where spruce logs are or something?
I’ve only been in the mines once, but I saw some around the top edge at the portal that looked like they could be reached…
Remember, I need [64 spruce logs] to have enough!
Well, you must really know where things are in the mines.
Only two more types of wood, got it?
Go ahead and start looking for birch logs.
I think [96 birch logs] should be enough.
I get that this is the hardest task I’ve given you so far, but you can get that much pretty quickly from what I’ve heard.
They say there’s a big pile of birch over by where Rick’s body was found, at the pond.
Make sure you get [96 birch logs] while you’re there.
Excellent, this is sure to be enough birch to last a long time.
One last thing before you go, I’m still short of some wood.
Go ahead and grab [128 jungle logs] for me.
Yeah, I know jungle logs are harder to get, but we need a lot.
Rick Jr once told me that he saw some in the tunnels over by the pond.
He also said they were kind of, well protected, and there weren’t very many, so be careful.
Just bring me [128 jungle logs] and then you’re done.
Yes! This is it!
Thank you [playername], we should be set for a while.
Here, take this, and I’ll be sure to let you know if I need more help later!
